attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The fuel duty on Diesel should be reduced imediatly. The high price of diesel compared to petrol is damaging the ecomomy of the country. Nearly all of public transport, road haulage, taxi's and the most enviromentaly friendly cars run on diesel.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
